class Dispatcher {
  constructor() {
    this.callbacks = []; // \uC2A4\uD1A0\uC5B4\uC5D0\uC11C \uB4F1\uB85D\uD55C \uCF5C\uBC31 \uB9AC\uC2A4\uD2B8
  }

  // Store\uAC00 \uC790\uC2E0\uC758 \uC561\uC158 \uD578\uB4E4\uB7EC\uB97C \uB4F1\uB85D
  register(callback) {
    this.callbacks.push(callback);
  }

  // \uC561\uC158\uC774 \uBC1C\uC0DD\uD558\uBA74 \uB4F1\uB85D\uB41C \uBAA8\uB4E0 \uCF5C\uBC31\uC5D0 \uC561\uC158 \uC804\uB2EC
  dispatch(action) {
    for (const callback of this.callbacks) {
      callback(action);
    }
  }
}

export const dispatcher = new Dispatcher();

import { dispatcher } from "../dispatcher/dispatcher";

let count = 0; // \uD604\uC7AC \uC0C1\uD0DC
let listeners = []; // View\uC5D0\uC11C \uB4F1\uB85D\uD55C \uAD6C\uB3C5\uC790 \uBAA9\uB85D

export const getState = () => count;

export const subscribe = (listener) => {
  listeners.push(listener);
  return () => {
    listeners = listeners.filter((l) => l !== listener);
  };
};

// \uC2A4\uD1A0\uC5B4\uB294 dispatcher\uC5D0 \uC790\uAE30 \uC790\uC2E0\uC744 \uB4F1\uB85D
dispatcher.register((action) => {
  switch (action.type) {
    case "INCREMENT":
      count += 1;
      // \uC0C1\uD0DC \uBCC0\uACBD\uC744 View\uC5D0 \uC54C\uB9BC
      listeners.forEach((listener) => listener());
      break;
    default:
      break;
  }
});

import { useEffect, useState } from "react";
import { getState, subscribe } from "../store/counterStore";
import { incrementCounter } from "../actions/counterActions";

export default function Counter() {
  const [count, setCount] = useState(getState());

  useEffect(() => {
    const unsubscribe = subscribe(() => {
      setCount(getState()); // \uC0C1\uD0DC \uC5C5\uB370\uC774\uD2B8 \uC2DC \uC7AC\uB80C\uB354\uB9C1
    });

    // \uCEF4\uD3EC\uB10C\uD2B8 \uC5B8\uB9C8\uC6B4\uD2B8 \uC2DC \uAD6C\uB3C5 \uD574\uC81C
    return unsubscribe;
  }, []);

  return (
    <div>
      <h1>Count: {count}</h1>
      <button onClick={incrementCounter}>+1</button>
    </div>
  );
}
`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/songhaeun/Desktop/dev/songhaeun-blog/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-28de5672-0336-4693-a46a-317186a4353c.mdx",lineNumber:124,columnNumber:1},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/songhaeun/Desktop/dev/songhaeun-blog/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-28de5672-0336-4693-a46a-317186a4353c.mdx",lineNumber:124,columnNumber:1},this),`
